original: Majjhima Nikāya 102
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Pañcattayasutta
analyzed: pañcattaya sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā aparantakappikā aparantānudiṭṭhino aparantaṁ ārabbha anekavihitāni adhivuttipadāni abhivadanti.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave eke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ aparanta kappikāḥ aparanta anudiṭṭhinaḥ aparantam ārabbha aneka vihitāni adhivutti padāni abhivadanti

original: ‘Saññī attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā’ti—
analyzed: saññī attā hoti arogaḥ param

original: ittheke abhivadanti;
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti

original: ‘asaññī attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā’ti—
analyzed: a saññī attā hoti arogaḥ param maraṇāti

original: ittheke abhivadanti;
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti

original: ‘nevasaññīnāsaññī attā hoti arogo paraṁ maraṇā’ti—
analyzed: na ivasaññī na asaññī attā hoti arogaḥ param

original: ittheke abhivadanti;
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti

original: sato vā pana sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapenti, diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṁ vā paneke abhivadanti.
analyzed: sataḥ vā pana sattassa ucchedam vināsam vibhavam paññapenti diṭṭhadhamma nibbānam vā pana eke abhivadanti

original: Iti santaṁ vā attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, sato vā pana sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapenti, diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṁ vā paneke abhivadanti.
analyzed: iti santam vā attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā sataḥ vā pana sattassa ucchedam vināsam vibhavam paññapenti diṭṭhadhamma nibbānam vā pana eke abhivadanti

original: Iti imāni pañca hutvā tīṇi honti, tīṇi hutvā pañca honti—
analyzed: iti imāni pañca hutvā tīṇi honti tīṇi hutvā pañca honti

original: ayamuddeso pañcattayassa.
analyzed: ayam uddesaḥ pañcattayassa

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: rūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: rūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: arūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: rūpiñca arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ
analyzed: rūpin ca arūpin ca vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam para

original: maraṇā, nevarūpiṁ nārūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ
analyzed: maraṇā nevarūpim na arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti aroga

original: paraṁ maraṇā, ekattasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: param maraṇā ekatta saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, nānattasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā nānatta saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, parittasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā paritta saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, appamāṇasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā appamāṇa saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, etaṁ vā panekesaṁ upātivattataṁ viññāṇakasiṇameke abhivadanti appamāṇaṁ āneñjaṁ.
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā etam vā pana ekesam viññāṇa kasiṇam eke abhivadanti appamāṇam āneñja

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti.
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: Ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiṁ
analyzed: ye kho te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā rūpi

original: vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, arūpiṁ
analyzed: vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā arūpi

original: vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiñca
analyzed: vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā rūpin ca

original: arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: arūpin ca vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: nevarūpiṁ nārūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ
analyzed: nevarūpim na arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam para

original: maraṇā, ekattasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ
analyzed: maraṇā ekatta saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti aroga

original: paraṁ maraṇā, nānattasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: param maraṇā nānatta saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, parittasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā paritta saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, appamāṇasaññiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā appamāṇa saññim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, yā vā panetāsaṁ saññānaṁ parisuddhā paramā aggā anuttariyā akkhāyati—
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā yā vā panetāsam saññānam parisuddhā paramā aggā anuttariyā akkhāyati

original: yadi rūpasaññānaṁ yadi arūpasaññānaṁ yadi ekattasaññānaṁ yadi nānattasaññānaṁ.
analyzed: yadi rūpa saññānam yadi arūpa saññānam yadi ekatta saññānam yadi nānatta saññāna

original: ‘Natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanameke abhivadanti appamāṇaṁ āneñjaṁ.
analyzed: na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam eke abhivadanti appamāṇam āneñja

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

original: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto.
analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: rūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: rūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: arūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: rūpiñca arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ
analyzed: rūpin ca arūpin ca vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam para

original: maraṇā, nevarūpiṁ nārūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: maraṇā na ivarūpim na arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā tesamete paṭikkosanti.
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā tesam ete paṭikkosanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Saññā rogo saññā gaṇḍo saññā sallaṁ, etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ: ‘asaññan’ti.
analyzed: saññā rogaḥ saññā gaṇḍo saññā sallaḥ etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam a saññanti

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiṁ
analyzed: ye kho te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā rūpi

original: vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, arūpiṁ
analyzed: vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā arūpi

original: vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiñca
analyzed: vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā rūpin ca

original: arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā,
analyzed: arūpin ca vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: nevarūpiṁ nārūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: nevarūpim na arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: yaḥ hi koci bhikkhave samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā evam vadeyya

original: ‘ahamaññatra rūpā, aññatra vedanāya, aññatra saññāya, aññatra saṅkhārehi, viññāṇassa āgatiṁ vā gatiṁ vā cutiṁ vā upapattiṁ vā vuddhiṁ vā virūḷhiṁ vā vepullaṁ vā paññapessāmī’ti—
analyzed: aham aññatra rūpā aññatra vedanāya aññatra saññāya aññatra saṅkhārehi viññāṇassa āgatim vā gatim vā cutim vā upapattim vā vuddhim vā virūḷhim vā vepullam vā paññapessāmi iti

original: netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

original: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto.
analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññīna asaññim attānam paññapenti aroga

original: paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: param maraṇā rūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññī nāsaññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, arūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ
analyzed: arogam param maraṇāḥ arūpim vā te bhontaḥ samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññī nāsaññim

original: paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiñca arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ
analyzed: paññapenti arogam param maraṇā rūpiñca arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññī nāsaññi

original: attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, nevarūpiṁ nārūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā
analyzed: attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā nevarūpim na arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā

original: nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: nevasaññīna asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: tesamete paṭikkosanti, yepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ
analyzed: tesam ete paṭikkosanti ye pi te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti aroga

original: paraṁ maraṇā tesamete paṭikkosanti.
analyzed: param maraṇā tesam ete paṭikkosanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Saññā rogo saññā gaṇḍo saññā sallaṁ, asaññā sammoho, etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ:
analyzed: saññā rogaḥ saññā gaṇḍo saññā salla asaññā sammoho etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam

original: ‘nevasaññānāsaññan’ti.
analyzed: na ivasañña anāsaññanti

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti.
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: Ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ
analyzed: ye kho te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññīna asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam para

original: maraṇā, rūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ
analyzed: maraṇā rūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññīna asaññim attānam paññapenti aroga

original: paraṁ maraṇā, arūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti
analyzed: param maraṇā arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññīna asaññim attānam paññapenti

original: arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, rūpiñca arūpiñca vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ
analyzed: arogam param maraṇā rūpin ca arūpin ca vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññī nāsaññi

original: attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā, nevarūpiṁ nārūpiṁ vā te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā
analyzed: attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā nevarūpim na arūpim vā te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā

original: nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā.
analyzed: nevasaññīna asaññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbasaṅkhāramattena
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā diṭṭha suta muta viññātabba saṅkhāra mattena

original: etassa āyatanassa upasampadaṁ paññapenti, byasanañhetaṁ, bhikkhave, akkhāyati etassa
analyzed: etassa āyatanassa upasampadam paññapenti byasanam ha ita bhikkhave akkhāyati etassa

original: āyatanassa upasampadāya.
analyzed: āyatanassa upasampadāya

original: Na hetaṁ, bhikkhave, āyatanaṁ saṅkhārasamāpattipattabbamakkhāyati;
analyzed: na heta bhikkhave āyatanam saṅkhāra samāpatti pattabbam akkhāyati

original: saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattipattabbametaṁ, bhikkhave, āyatanamakkhāyati.
analyzed: saṅkhāra avasesa samāpatti pattabbam eta bhikkhave āyatanam akkhāyati

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

original: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto.
analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sato sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapenti,
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇā sataḥ sattassa ucchedam vināsam vibhavam paññapenti

original: tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā saññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇā saññim attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā

original: tesamete paṭikkosanti, yepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā asaññiṁ attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ
analyzed: tesam ete paṭikkosanti ye pi te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ asaññim attānam paññapenti aroga

original: paraṁ maraṇā tesamete paṭikkosanti, yepi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā nevasaññīnāsaññiṁ
analyzed: param tesam ete paṭikkosanti ye pi te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ nevasaññī nāsaññi

original: attānaṁ paññapenti arogaṁ paraṁ maraṇā tesamete paṭikkosanti.
analyzed: attānam paññapenti arogam param maraṇā tesam ete paṭikkosanti

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Sabbepime bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā uddhaṁ saraṁ āsattiṁyeva abhivadanti:
analyzed: sabbe pi ime bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ uddham saram āsattiyā iva abhivadanti

original: ‘iti pecca bhavissāma, iti pecca bhavissāmā’ti.
analyzed: iti pecca bhavissāma iti pecca bhavissāma ati

original: Seyyathāpi nāma vāṇijassa vāṇijjāya gacchato evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma vāṇijassa vāṇijjāya gacchataḥ evam hoti

original: ‘ito me idaṁ bhavissati, iminā idaṁ lacchāmī’ti;
analyzed: itas me idam bhavissati iminā idam lacchāmi iti

original: evamevime bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā vāṇijūpamā maññe paṭibhanti:
analyzed: evam eva ime bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ vāṇijūpamāḥ maññe paṭibhanti

original: ‘iti pecca bhavissāma, iti pecca bhavissāmā’ti.
analyzed: iti pecca bhavissāma iti pecca bhavissāma ati

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti.
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: Ye kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā sato sattassa ucchedaṁ vināsaṁ vibhavaṁ paññapenti te sakkāyabhayā sakkāyaparijegucchā sakkāyaññeva anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti.
analyzed: ye kho te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā sataḥ sattassa ucchedam vināsam vibhavam paññapenti te sakkāya bhayā sakkāya parijegucchā sakkāyaññā iva anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma sā gaddulabaddho daḷhe thambhe vā khile vā upanibaddho, tameva thambhaṁ vā khilaṁ vā anuparidhāvati anuparivattati;
analyzed: sā iyyathā api nāma sā gaddula baddhaḥ daḷhe thambhe vā khile vā upanibaddhaḥ tam eva thambham vā khilam vā anuparidhāvati anuparivattati

original: evamevime bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā sakkāyabhayā sakkāyaparijegucchā sakkāyaññeva anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti.
analyzed: evam eva ime bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā sakkāya bhayā sakkāya parijegucchā sakkāyaññā iva anuparidhāvanti anuparivattanti

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

original: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto.
analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā aparantakappikā aparantānudiṭṭhino aparantaṁ
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā aparanta kappikāḥ aparanta anudiṭṭhinaḥ aparanta

original: ārabbha anekavihitāni adhivuttipadāni abhivadanti, sabbe te imāneva pañcāyatanāni
analyzed: ārabbha aneka vihitāni adhivutti padāni abhivadanti sabbe te imān eva pañca āyatanāni

original: abhivadanti etesaṁ vā aññataraṁ.
analyzed: abhivadanti etesam vai aññatara

original: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā pubbantakappikā pubbantānudiṭṭhino pubbantaṁ ārabbha anekavihitāni adhivuttipadāni abhivadanti.
analyzed: santi bhikkhave eke samaṇa brāhmaṇā pubbanta kappikā pubbanta anudiṭṭhino pubbantam ārabbha aneka vihitāni adhivutti padāni abhivadanti

original: ‘Sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: sassataḥ attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘asassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti a sassataḥ attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘sassato ca asassato ca attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti sassato ca a sassato ca attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘nevasassato nāsassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti na iva sassataḥ na a sassataḥ attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘antavā attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti antavā attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘anantavā attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti anantavā attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘antavā ca anantavā ca attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti antavā ca anantavā ca attā ca ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘nevantavā nānantavā attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti na ivantavā na anantavā attā ca ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘ekattasaññī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti ekatta saññī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘nānattasaññī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti nānatta saññī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘parittasaññī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti paritta saññī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘appamāṇasaññī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti appamāṇa saññī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘ekantasukhī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti ekanta sukhī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘ekantadukkhī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti ekanta dukkhī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘sukhadukkhī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti sukha dukkhī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘adukkhamasukhī attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti—
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti adukkham asukhī attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: ittheke abhivadanti.
analyzed: itthā ike abhivadanti

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: ‘sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’ti, tesaṁ vata aññatreva saddhāya
analyzed: sassataḥ attā ca loko ca idam eva saccam mogham aññanti tesam vata aññatra iva saddhāya

original: aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā
analyzed: aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavāḥ aññatra ākāra parivitakkāḥ aññatra diṭṭhi nijjhāna kkhantiyā

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pubbantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca paṭinissaggā

original: aparantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā, sabbaso kāmasaṁyojanānaṁ anadhiṭṭhānā, pavivekaṁ
analyzed: paṭinissaggā sabbaso kāma sayojanānam anadhiṭṭhānā

original: pītiṁ upasampajja viharati:

original: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
analyzed: etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam pa vivekam pītim upasampajja viharāmi iti

original: Tassa sā pavivekā pīti nirujjhati.
analyzed: tassa sā pavivekā pīti nirujjhati

original: Pavivekāya pītiyā nirodhā uppajjati domanassaṁ, domanassassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti.
analyzed: pavivekāya pītiyāḥ nirodhā uppajjati domanassa domanassassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṁ chāyā jahati taṁ ātapo pharati, yaṁ ātapo jahati taṁ chāyā pharati;

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, pavivekāya pītiyā nirodhā uppajjati domanassaṁ, domanassassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave pavivekāya pītiyāḥ nirodhā uppajjati domanassa domanassassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti.
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: Ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pubbantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā, aparantānudiṭṭhīnañca
analyzed: ayam kho bhavam samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca paṭinissaggā aparanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca

original: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ pavivekaṁ pītiṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
analyzed: etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam pa vivekam pītim upasampajja viharāmi iti

original: Tassa sā pavivekā pīti nirujjhati.
analyzed: tassa sā pavivekā pīti nirujjhati

original: Pavivekāya pītiyā nirodhā uppajjati domanassaṁ, domanassassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti.
analyzed: pavivekāya pītiyāḥ nirodhā uppajjati domanassa domanassassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti

analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca paṭinissaggā

original: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.

original: Tassa taṁ nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ nirujjhati.
analyzed: tassa tam nirāmisam sukham nirujjhati

original: Nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati pavivekā pīti, pavivekāya pītiyā nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ.

original: aparantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā, sabbaso kāmasaṁyojanānaṁ anadhiṭṭhānā, pavivekāya
analyzed: paṭinissaggā sabbaso kāma sayojanānam anadhiṭṭhānā pavivekāya

original: pītiyā samatikkamā, nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā, adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharati:
analyzed: pītiyāḥ samatikkamā nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā adukkham asukham vedanam upasampajja viharati

original: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
analyzed: etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam adukkham asukham vedanam upasampajja viharāmi iti

original: Tassa sā adukkhamasukhā vedanā nirujjhati.
analyzed: tassa sā adukkhamasukhā vedanā nirujjhati

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ, nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
analyzed: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisam sukha nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṁ chāyā jahati taṁ ātapo pharati, yaṁ ātapo jahati taṁ chāyā pharati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yam chāyā jahati tam ātapaḥ pharati yam ātapaḥ jahati tam chāyā pharati

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ, nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisam sukha nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti.
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: Ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pubbantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā, aparantānudiṭṭhīnañca
analyzed: ayam kho bhavam samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca paṭinissaggā aparanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca

original: paṭinissaggā, sabbaso kāmasaṁyojanānaṁ anadhiṭṭhānā, pavivekāya pītiyā samatikkamā,
analyzed: paṭinissaggā sabbaso kāma sayojanānam anadhiṭṭhānā pavivekāya pītiyā samatikkamā

original: nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā, adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharati:
analyzed: nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā adukkham asukham vedanam upasampajja viharati

original: ‘etaṁ santaṁ etaṁ paṇītaṁ yadidaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ vedanaṁ upasampajja viharāmī’ti.
analyzed: etam santam etam paṇītam yat idam adukkham asukham vedanam upasampajja viharāmi iti

original: Tassa sā adukkhamasukhā vedanā nirujjhati.
analyzed: tassa sā adukkhamasukhā vedanā nirujjhati

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisaṁ sukhaṁ, nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
analyzed: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisam sukha nirāmisassa sukhassa nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

original: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto.
analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pubbantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā,
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca paṭinissaggā

original: aparantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā, sabbaso kāmasaṁyojanānaṁ anadhiṭṭhānā, pavivekāya
analyzed: paṭinissaggā sabbaso kāma sayojanānam anadhiṭṭhānā pavivekāya

original: pītiyā samatikkamā, nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya samatikkamā:
analyzed: pītiyā samatikkamā nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya samatikkamā

original: ‘santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupādānohamasmī’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: santaḥ ham asmi nibbutaḥ ham asmi anupādānaḥ ham asmi iti samanupassati

original: Tayidaṁ, bhikkhave, tathāgato abhijānāti.
analyzed: tayida bhikkhave tathāgataḥ abhijānāti

original: Ayaṁ kho bhavaṁ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pubbantānudiṭṭhīnañca paṭinissaggā, aparantānudiṭṭhīnañca
analyzed: ayam kho bhavam samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca paṭinissaggā aparanta anudiṭṭhīnam ca

original: paṭinissaggā, sabbaso kāmasaṁyojanānaṁ anadhiṭṭhānā, pavivekāya pītiyā samatikkamā,
analyzed: paṭinissaggā sabbaso kāma sayojanānam anadhiṭṭhānā pavivekāya pītiyā samatikkamā

original: nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya samatikkamā:
analyzed: nirāmisassa sukhassa samatikkamā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya samatikkamā

original: ‘santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupādānohamasmī’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: santaḥ ham asmi nibbutaḥ ham asmi anupādānaḥ ham asmi iti samanupassati

original: addhā ayamāyasmā nibbānasappāyaṁyeva paṭipadaṁ abhivadati.
analyzed: addhā ayam āyasmā nibbāna sappāyayā iva paṭipadam abhivadati

original: Atha ca panāyaṁ bhavaṁ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā pubbantānudiṭṭhiṁ vā upādiyamāno upādiyati,
analyzed: atha ca pana ayam bhavam samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā pubbanta anudiṭṭhim vā upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati

original: aparantānudiṭṭhiṁ vā upādiyamāno upādiyati, kāmasaṁyojanaṁ vā upādiyamāno upādiyati,
analyzed: aparanta anudiṭṭhim vai upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati kāma sayojanam vai upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati

original: pavivekaṁ vā pītiṁ upādiyamāno upādiyati, nirāmisaṁ vā sukhaṁ upādiyamāno upādiyati,
analyzed: vā pītim upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati nirāmisam vā sukham upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati

original: adukkhamasukhaṁ vā vedanaṁ upādiyamāno upādiyati.
analyzed: adukkham asukham vā vedanam upādiyamānaḥ upādiyati

original: Yañca kho ayamāyasmā:
analyzed: yat ca khaḥ ayam āyasmā

original: ‘santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupādānohamasmī’ti samanupassati tadapi imassa bhoto samaṇassa brāhmaṇassa upādānamakkhāyati.
analyzed: santaḥ ham asmi nibbutaḥ ham asmi anupādānaḥ ham asmi iti samanupassati tat api imassa bhoto samaṇassa brāhmaṇassa upādānam akkhāyati

original: ‘Tayidaṁ saṅkhataṁ oḷārikaṁ atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṁ nirodho atthetan’ti—
analyzed: tayā idam saṅkhatam oḷārikam atthi kho pana saṅkhārānam nirodhaḥ attha itanti

original: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto.
analyzed: iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇa dassāvī tathāgato tad upātivatto

original: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, tathāgatena anuttaraṁ santivarapadaṁ abhisambuddhaṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: idam kho pana bhikkhave tathāgatena anuttaram santivara padam abhisambuddham

original: channaṁ phassāyatanānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ viditvā anupādāvimokkho”ti.
analyzed: channam phassa āyatanānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam viditvā an upādā vimokkhā ti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Pañcattayasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: pañcattaya suttam niṭṭhitam dutiya
